pages.title: Wither Bones
pages.text: Wither bones obtained from butchering wither skeletons corpses. The bones can be ground into wither bone meal using the $(l:butchery:blocks/pestle_and_mortar)pestle and mortar$(). The bonemeal can then be used to convert regular roses into wither roses, this is a chance bases conversion so it will not work every time.
